text: Erich Gruenberg (12 October 1924 â€“ 7 August 2020) was an Austrian-born British violinist and teacher. He was a principal violinist of major orchestras in Stockholm and London. He taught at the Royal Academy of Music. He was born in Vienna. Gruenberg died on 7 August 2020, at the Hampstead Garden Suburb in London at age 95. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian violinists Category:British violinists Category:Academics of the Royal Academy of Music Category:Musicians from Vienna
title: Erich Gruenberg
